bibl.title: The Writing of History in Ancient Egypt during the First Millennium BC (ca. 1070-180 BC). Trends and Perspectives. (GHP. Egyptology. 5.)
bibl.note: Ph.D., Univ. of Birmingham, 2003. - Part One: Royal Inscriptions. - 1. The Libyan Period. - 2. The Nubian Period. - 3. The Saite Period and the Last Indigenous Dynasties. - 4. The Persian and Ptolemaic Periods. - Part Two: Histories. - 5. Herodotus' Egyptian History. - 6. Manetho. - 7. Stories. - 8. The Apocalyptic Literature. - Conclusions. - Appendices. Bibliography.
